developerResponse: {'id': 31811055, 'body': 'Sorry for any confusion! It sounds like you might have our Simplify Debts feature enabled. This feature reshuffles "who owes who" to minimize repayments. This feature is helpful but can be confusing if you’re not expecting it. You can find the setting in your Group Settings screen. Hope this helps! If not, we\'re always happy to help look into what might be going wrong, please send a note to support@splitwise.com.\n', 'modified': '2022-09-04T00:18:56Z'}

title: Life saver, huge scope for improvement
review:
Really a very useful app. One of the essentials apps for me. Best thing about it is its simplicity. However, some attention to improvement is required. Such as -

1. Better charts and drill down capabilities in Pro. I see the bars, i see a spike in a monthly expense, but I can’t drill down to that expense category to see what exactly caused the spike.
2. Settle all balances are treated as expenses. Due to this there are spiked expenses data, not very easy for analysis.
3. Integration with spend sources, like bank apps, apple pay etc will enhance its usability.

title: Total group balance incorrect
review:
Hi,

We did below transaction scenarios and found this error.

1.  3 member group, entered 10 Indian rupees split equally and change the currency to sar and not the amount. The Sar balance altered and total balance is not tallying in sar.

2. 3 member group, entered 20 sar, split between 2 member but the 3rd member’s balance is getting altered without involved in transaction.

This is quite confusing and makes not to rely on applications.

title: The pro version is not very intuitive
review:
I have used Splitwise for years and it’s been useful when I had to split expenditures with flatmates.
But now as a homemaker, I am really struggling to leverage this app to store collective and individual expenditures.

I can only enter my individual expense on the group I share with my husband. He has to do his data entry by himself. Else we have to choose a “split” option. Why would you force that???
I should be able to do all this data entry by myself, even if I have to do it for the other members in my house!!

The below review is for Pro version:
Charts are restricted to a pie. 
Only absolute nos. no percentage split
No way to see who contributes how much share of the expenditure. 
In this post CoViD world, when all receipts are digital, I don’t see the point of receipt scanning.
Itemisation barely makes sense if you give just limited Color palette for high level items in the charts to start with.
In short, there is no way to analyse the Data if visualisation is so limited. Charge me for subscription but at least make it worthwhile.

It’s turning out to be a disappointing journey in managing expenditures using Splitwise, when one moves from one stage of life to another.
developerResponse: {'id': 20860120, 'body': "Sorry you had a negative experience with Splitwise! We'd love to connect and help you in any way we can. Please send a note to support@splitwise.com so that we can look into these issues further. Thanks!", 'modified': '2021-02-04T14:19:37Z'}

review: Doesn’t have option if the amount settled between parties
developerResponse: {'id': 10037744, 'body': 'Hi there. To record that a debt has been repaid, please tap "Settle up". To discuss further please write support@splitwise.com. Cheers!', 'modified': '2019-08-06T17:25:58Z'}

title: Amazing app
review: Hazel free expenses accountancy especially when travelling with group of friends.

title: Suggestion for a needed feature
review:
Been using this app for a long time.
When we settle up with a friend from the friends tab and who is a member of two or more groups, the payment should be reflected in each of the group individually so that all the groups get settled too. This will allow us to remove the friend from a group which has already settled up with him in that group.

title: Very useful. But need more features
review:
Need complete expense manager with following features 
Credit,debit & Netbanking auto expense tracking
Budget allocations and reports
Category wise reports 
Suggestions

title: Can’t manage large groups with this
review:
Not everyone wants to have an app - and this app literally forces everyone to manage unequal splits by asking them to upgrade. 

Here are my 0.02c - create a good app - don’t just run after monetization at the expense of ease of use. 

Make people settle payments through the app - how is that for an upgrade.
developerResponse: {'id': 9928088, 'body': "Sorry for any confusion! You don't need to sign up for Pro to add expenses that are split unequally. If you're seeing an ad when trying to modify the split of an expense please send a note to support@splitwise.com.", 'modified': '2019-07-30T19:45:52Z'}
